TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national , born in DATE . He is represented before the ORG by PERSON GPE , a lawyer practising in PERSON . The respondent Government are represented by Ambassador PERSON , Head of ORG of ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

On DATE the applicant was arrested in GPE and taken into detention with a view to his extradition ( PERSON ) . DATE he was transferred to GPE and remanded in custody by ORG ( PERSON ) on suspicion of murder and aggravated robbery .

On DATE the ORG sitting as an assize court ( Geschwornengericht ) acquitted the applicant of all the charges against him . Upon the pronouncement of the acquittal , the applicant was released . The judgment was served on the applicant on DATE and became final on DATE .
Immediately after the pronouncement of the acquittal , at the same hearing , the applicant requested compensation for his detention on remand .

ORG , with the same composition as above , dismissed the applicant ’s claim . It found that the suspicion against the applicant had not been dispelled and that , thus , the requirements of section CARDINAL ( CARDINAL ) of the Compensation ( Criminal Proceedings ) Act DATE ( ORG DATE - “ the DATE LAW ) were not met . The court ’s decision was served on the applicant after his acquittal had become final .
The applicant lodged an appeal with ORG ( Oberlandesgericht ) . He complained , in particular , that ORG decision violated the presumption of innocence .
On DATE ORG dismissed the applicant ’s appeal . Its decision was served on the applicant ’s counsel on DATE .

On DATE ORG , upon ORG request , ordered the re - opening of the criminal proceedings against the applicant , having regard to new statements by CARDINAL witnesses . Consequently , it quashed the acquittal of DATE . According to section CARDINAL § CARDINAL of LAW , the proceedings were resumed at the stage of preliminary investigations .
On DATE ORG filed the indictment , charging the applicant again with murder and aggravated robbery .
On DATE an international arrest warrant was issued . Currently , the applicant ’s whereabouts are unknown and the criminal proceedings against him are still pending .
